vc.prottype: FWLIBAPI short WINAPI cnc_seqsrch2(unsigned short FlibHndl, long seq_no);

cmn.p: Searches the specified sequence number of the selected program in CNC.
The searching speed of this function is more than cnc_seqsrch.
The status of CNC does not change in this function though CNC becomes "STOP" mode by the cnc_search function after searches.

content.p: Specify the library handle. See "Library handle" for details.

item.name: EW_DATA
item.content:
Data error
The specified sequence number does not exist.

item.name: EW_NOOPT
item.content:
No option
The extended driver/library function is necessary.

item.name: EW_MODE
item.content:
CNC mode error
See the section of CNC mode.

item.name: EW_REJECT
item.content:
CNC execution denied
30i/31i/32i CNC is in the emergency stop.

option.hssb: The extended driver/library function is necessary.

cmn.ul: Series 16i/18i/21i It is possible to use in MEM mode.
